meanings.definition: The quality or state of being objectionable.
meanings.sent1: The objectionablenesses of the movie's content made it unsuitable for children.
meanings.sent2: I could not ignore the objectionablenesses of his behavior any longer.
meanings.sent3: The objectionablenesses of the situation were so clear, it was almost comical.
meanings.sent4: Her words were filled with objectionablenesses that left a bitter taste in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The objectionablenesses of the new policy were impossible to overlook.

meanings.sent1: She pointed out all the objectionablenesses in the report.
meanings.sent2: The store manager removed all objectionablenesses from the shelves.
meanings.sent3: The objectionablenesses in the room were like hidden treasures waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent4: The objectionablenesses of the painting were subtle but impactful.
meanings.sent5: He carefully avoided the objectionablenesses in his speech to keep everyone happy.
